name: skillforge-chathub-root
description: Root package to manage client and server

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive:true}); fs.cpSync('client/dist', 'dist', {recursive: true});"
